title: Chaos and Order Missions not working
body:
So I've completed 3 already but the rest aren't showing up for me to complete them

I know its a daily thing, but its been a day already and still no Missions

Some of my friends say they were able to just keep doing the Missions but I can't

FIX PLEASE

replies.body: Missions should refresh around 11am Pacific across each region, so everything should be good to go.  Let me know if this is still an issue for you, though!

I have a problem where I completed the first one and two in the order mission line,now all I have left is the "complete 7 missions" mission and I can't because no new ones are showing up and the chaos ones disappeared.
I have the same problem. I did my win matchmade game with order icon yesterday afternoon. Today still no new missions . Please help!
My league of legends missions aren't working either.
My missions are not working too, they show 0/1 even I complete the requirements.
I have done several missions as well... But they are not working. Hope you can fix:D
I am having the same issue. It has been well over 24 hrs since I have gotten any new missions

> [{quoted}](name=SanoBlume,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=E1XwhOAL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-01T20:44:26.306+0000)
>
> I am having the same issue. It has been well over 24 hrs since I have gotten any new missions

Its over 2 day ago bro LMAO
